00059 /********************************** Free *************************************/
00060 
00061 void render_result_free(RenderResult *res)
00062 {
00063     if (res==NULL) return;
00064 
00065     while (res->layers.first) {
00066         RenderLayer *rl= res->layers.first;
00067         
00068         if (rl->rectf) MEM_freeN(rl->rectf);
00069         /* acolrect and scolrect are optionally allocated in shade_tile, only free here since it can be used for drawing */
00070         if (rl->acolrect) MEM_freeN(rl->acolrect);
00071         if (rl->scolrect) MEM_freeN(rl->scolrect);
00072         
00073         while (rl->passes.first) {
00074             RenderPass *rpass= rl->passes.first;
00075             if (rpass->rect) MEM_freeN(rpass->rect);
00076             BLI_remlink(&rl->passes, rpass);
00077             MEM_freeN(rpass);
00078         }
00079         BLI_remlink(&res->layers, rl);
00080         MEM_freeN(rl);
00081     }
00082     
00083     if (res->rect32)
00084         MEM_freeN(res->rect32);
00085     if (res->rectz)
00086         MEM_freeN(res->rectz);
00087     if (res->rectf)
00088         MEM_freeN(res->rectf);
00089     if (res->text)
00090         MEM_freeN(res->text);
00091     
00092     MEM_freeN(res);
00093 }
00094 
00095 /* version that's compatible with fullsample buffers */
00096 void render_result_free_list(ListBase *lb, RenderResult *rr)
00097 {
00098     RenderResult *rrnext;
00099     
00100     for (; rr; rr= rrnext) {
00101         rrnext= rr->next;
00102         
00103         if (lb && lb->first)
00104             BLI_remlink(lb, rr);
00105         
00106         render_result_free(rr);
00107     }
00108 }

00112 /* NOTE: OpenEXR only supports 32 chars for layer+pass names
00113  * In blender we now use max 10 chars for pass, max 20 for layer */
00114 static const char *get_pass_name(int passtype, int channel)
00115 {
00116     
00117     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_COMBINED) {
00118         if (channel==-1) return "Combined";
00119         if (channel==0) return "Combined.R";
00120         if (channel==1) return "Combined.G";
00121         if (channel==2) return "Combined.B";
00122         return "Combined.A";
00123     }
00124     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_Z) {
00125         if (channel==-1) return "Depth";
00126         return "Depth.Z";
00127     }
00128     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_VECTOR) {
00129         if (channel==-1) return "Vector";
00130         if (channel==0) return "Vector.X";
00131         if (channel==1) return "Vector.Y";
00132         if (channel==2) return "Vector.Z";
00133         return "Vector.W";
00134     }
00135     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_NORMAL) {
00136         if (channel==-1) return "Normal";
00137         if (channel==0) return "Normal.X";
00138         if (channel==1) return "Normal.Y";
00139         return "Normal.Z";
00140     }
00141     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_UV) {
00142         if (channel==-1) return "UV";
00143         if (channel==0) return "UV.U";
00144         if (channel==1) return "UV.V";
00145         return "UV.A";
00146     }
00147     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_RGBA) {
00148         if (channel==-1) return "Color";
00149         if (channel==0) return "Color.R";
00150         if (channel==1) return "Color.G";
00151         if (channel==2) return "Color.B";
00152         return "Color.A";
00153     }
00154     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_EMIT) {
00155         if (channel==-1) return "Emit";
00156         if (channel==0) return "Emit.R";
00157         if (channel==1) return "Emit.G";
00158         return "Emit.B";
00159     }
00160     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE) {
00161         if (channel==-1) return "Diffuse";
00162         if (channel==0) return "Diffuse.R";
00163         if (channel==1) return "Diffuse.G";
00164         return "Diffuse.B";
00165     }
00166     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_SPEC) {
00167         if (channel==-1) return "Spec";
00168         if (channel==0) return "Spec.R";
00169         if (channel==1) return "Spec.G";
00170         return "Spec.B";
00171     }
00172     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_SHADOW) {
00173         if (channel==-1) return "Shadow";
00174         if (channel==0) return "Shadow.R";
00175         if (channel==1) return "Shadow.G";
00176         return "Shadow.B";
00177     }
00178     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_AO) {
00179         if (channel==-1) return "AO";
00180         if (channel==0) return "AO.R";
00181         if (channel==1) return "AO.G";
00182         return "AO.B";
00183     }
00184     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_ENVIRONMENT) {
00185         if (channel==-1) return "Env";
00186         if (channel==0) return "Env.R";
00187         if (channel==1) return "Env.G";
00188         return "Env.B";
00189     }
00190     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_INDIRECT) {
00191         if (channel==-1) return "Indirect";
00192         if (channel==0) return "Indirect.R";
00193         if (channel==1) return "Indirect.G";
00194         return "Indirect.B";
00195     }
00196     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_REFLECT) {
00197         if (channel==-1) return "Reflect";
00198         if (channel==0) return "Reflect.R";
00199         if (channel==1) return "Reflect.G";
00200         return "Reflect.B";
00201     }
00202     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_REFRACT) {
00203         if (channel==-1) return "Refract";
00204         if (channel==0) return "Refract.R";
00205         if (channel==1) return "Refract.G";
00206         return "Refract.B";
00207     }
00208     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_INDEXOB) {
00209         if (channel==-1) return "IndexOB";
00210         return "IndexOB.X";
00211     }
00212     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_INDEXMA) {
00213         if (channel==-1) return "IndexMA";
00214         return "IndexMA.X";
00215     }
00216     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_MIST) {
00217         if (channel==-1) return "Mist";
00218         return "Mist.Z";
00219     }
00220     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_RAYHITS) {
00221         if (channel==-1) return "Rayhits";
00222         if (channel==0) return "Rayhits.R";
00223         if (channel==1) return "Rayhits.G";
00224         return "Rayhits.B";
00225     }
00226     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT) {
00227         if (channel==-1) return "DiffDir";
00228         if (channel==0) return "DiffDir.R";
00229         if (channel==1) return "DiffDir.G";
00230         return "DiffDir.B";
00231     }
00232     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT) {
00233         if (channel==-1) return "DiffInd";
00234         if (channel==0) return "DiffInd.R";
00235         if (channel==1) return "DiffInd.G";
00236         return "DiffInd.B";
00237     }
00238     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR) {
00239         if (channel==-1) return "DiffCol";
00240         if (channel==0) return "DiffCol.R";
00241         if (channel==1) return "DiffCol.G";
00242         return "DiffCol.B";
00243     }
00244     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT) {
00245         if (channel==-1) return "GlossDir";
00246         if (channel==0) return "GlossDir.R";
00247         if (channel==1) return "GlossDir.G";
00248         return "GlossDir.B";
00249     }
00250     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT) {
00251         if (channel==-1) return "GlossInd";
00252         if (channel==0) return "GlossInd.R";
00253         if (channel==1) return "GlossInd.G";
00254         return "GlossInd.B";
00255     }
00256     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR) {
00257         if (channel==-1) return "GlossCol";
00258         if (channel==0) return "GlossCol.R";
00259         if (channel==1) return "GlossCol.G";
00260         return "GlossCol.B";
00261     }
00262     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_TRANSM_DIRECT) {
00263         if (channel==-1) return "TransDir";
00264         if (channel==0) return "TransDir.R";
00265         if (channel==1) return "TransDir.G";
00266         return "TransDir.B";
00267     }
00268     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_TRANSM_INDIRECT) {
00269         if (channel==-1) return "TransInd";
00270         if (channel==0) return "TransInd.R";
00271         if (channel==1) return "TransInd.G";
00272         return "TransInd.B";
00273     }
00274     if (passtype == SCE_PASS_TRANSM_COLOR) {
00275         if (channel==-1) return "TransCol";
00276         if (channel==0) return "TransCol.R";
00277         if (channel==1) return "TransCol.G";
00278         return "TransCol.B";
00279     }
00280     return "Unknown";
00281 }
00282 
00283 static int passtype_from_name(const char *str)
00284 {
00285     
00286     if (strcmp(str, "Combined")==0)
00287         return SCE_PASS_COMBINED;
00288 
00289     if (strcmp(str, "Depth")==0)
00290         return SCE_PASS_Z;
00291 
00292     if (strcmp(str, "Vector")==0)
00293         return SCE_PASS_VECTOR;
00294 
00295     if (strcmp(str, "Normal")==0)
00296         return SCE_PASS_NORMAL;
00297 
00298     if (strcmp(str, "UV")==0)
00299         return SCE_PASS_UV;
00300 
00301     if (strcmp(str, "Color")==0)
00302         return SCE_PASS_RGBA;
00303 
00304     if (strcmp(str, "Emit")==0)
00305         return SCE_PASS_EMIT;
00306 
00307     if (strcmp(str, "Diffuse")==0)
00308         return SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE;
00309 
00310     if (strcmp(str, "Spec")==0)
00311         return SCE_PASS_SPEC;
00312 
00313     if (strcmp(str, "Shadow")==0)
00314         return SCE_PASS_SHADOW;
00315     
00316     if (strcmp(str, "AO")==0)
00317         return SCE_PASS_AO;
00318 
00319     if (strcmp(str, "Env")==0)
00320         return SCE_PASS_ENVIRONMENT;
00321 
00322     if (strcmp(str, "Indirect")==0)
00323         return SCE_PASS_INDIRECT;
00324 
00325     if (strcmp(str, "Reflect")==0)
00326         return SCE_PASS_REFLECT;
00327 
00328     if (strcmp(str, "Refract")==0)
00329         return SCE_PASS_REFRACT;
00330 
00331     if (strcmp(str, "IndexOB")==0)
00332         return SCE_PASS_INDEXOB;
00333 
00334     if (strcmp(str, "IndexMA")==0)
00335         return SCE_PASS_INDEXMA;
00336 
00337     if (strcmp(str, "Mist")==0)
00338         return SCE_PASS_MIST;
00339     
00340     if (strcmp(str, "RayHits")==0)
00341         return SCE_PASS_RAYHITS;
00342 
00343     if (strcmp(str, "DiffDir")==0)
00344         return SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT;
00345 
00346     if (strcmp(str, "DiffInd")==0)
00347         return SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT;
00348 
00349     if (strcmp(str, "DiffCol")==0)
00350         return SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR;
00351 
00352     if (strcmp(str, "GlossDir")==0)
00353         return SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT;
00354 
00355     if (strcmp(str, "GlossInd")==0)
00356         return SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT;
00357 
00358     if (strcmp(str, "GlossCol")==0)
00359         return SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR;
00360 
00361     if (strcmp(str, "TransDir")==0)
00362         return SCE_PASS_TRANSM_DIRECT;
00363 
00364     if (strcmp(str, "TransInd")==0)
00365         return SCE_PASS_TRANSM_INDIRECT;
00366 
00367     if (strcmp(str, "TransCol")==0)
00368         return SCE_PASS_TRANSM_COLOR;
00369 
00370     return 0;
00371 }
00372 
00373 /********************************** New **************************************/
00374 
00375 static void render_layer_add_pass(RenderResult *rr, RenderLayer *rl, int channels, int passtype)
00376 {
00377     const char *typestr= get_pass_name(passtype, 0);
00378     RenderPass *rpass= MEM_callocN(sizeof(RenderPass), typestr);
00379     int rectsize= rr->rectx*rr->recty*channels;
00380     
00381     BLI_addtail(&rl->passes, rpass);
00382     rpass->passtype= passtype;
00383     rpass->channels= channels;
00384     rpass->rectx= rl->rectx;
00385     rpass->recty= rl->recty;
00386     BLI_strncpy(rpass->name, get_pass_name(rpass->passtype, -1), sizeof(rpass->name));
00387     
00388     if (rr->exrhandle) {
00389         int a;
00390         for (a=0; a<channels; a++)
00391             IMB_exr_add_channel(rr->exrhandle, rl->name, get_pass_name(passtype, a), 0, 0, NULL);
00392     }
00393     else {
00394         float *rect;
00395         int x;
00396         
00397         rpass->rect= MEM_mapallocN(sizeof(float)*rectsize, typestr);
00398         
00399         if (passtype==SCE_PASS_VECTOR) {
00400             /* initialize to max speed */
00401             rect= rpass->rect;
00402             for (x= rectsize-1; x>=0; x--)
00403                 rect[x]= PASS_VECTOR_MAX;
00404         }
00405         else if (passtype==SCE_PASS_Z) {
00406             rect= rpass->rect;
00407             for (x= rectsize-1; x>=0; x--)
00408                 rect[x]= 10e10;
00409         }
00410     }
00411 }
00412 
00413 /* called by main render as well for parts */
00414 /* will read info from Render *re to define layers */
00415 /* called in threads */
00416 /* re->winx,winy is coordinate space of entire image, partrct the part within */
00417 RenderResult *render_result_new(Render *re, rcti *partrct, int crop, int savebuffers)
00418 {
00419     RenderResult *rr;
00420     RenderLayer *rl;
00421     SceneRenderLayer *srl;
00422     int rectx, recty, nr;
00423     
00424     rectx= partrct->xmax - partrct->xmin;
00425     recty= partrct->ymax - partrct->ymin;
00426     
00427     if (rectx<=0 || recty<=0)
00428         return NULL;
00429     
00430     rr= MEM_callocN(sizeof(RenderResult), "new render result");
00431     rr->rectx= rectx;
00432     rr->recty= recty;
00433     rr->renrect.xmin = 0; rr->renrect.xmax = rectx-2*crop;
00434     /* crop is one or two extra pixels rendered for filtering, is used for merging and display too */
00435     rr->crop= crop;
00436     
00437     /* tilerect is relative coordinates within render disprect. do not subtract crop yet */
00438     rr->tilerect.xmin = partrct->xmin - re->disprect.xmin;
00439     rr->tilerect.xmax = partrct->xmax - re->disprect.xmax;
00440     rr->tilerect.ymin = partrct->ymin - re->disprect.ymin;
00441     rr->tilerect.ymax = partrct->ymax - re->disprect.ymax;
00442     
00443     if (savebuffers) {
00444         rr->exrhandle= IMB_exr_get_handle();
00445     }
00446     
00447     /* check renderdata for amount of layers */
00448     for (nr=0, srl= re->r.layers.first; srl; srl= srl->next, nr++) {
00449         
00450         if ((re->r.scemode & R_SINGLE_LAYER) && nr!=re->r.actlay)
00451             continue;
00452         if (srl->layflag & SCE_LAY_DISABLE)
00453             continue;
00454         
00455         rl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(RenderLayer), "new render layer");
00456         BLI_addtail(&rr->layers, rl);
00457         
00458         BLI_strncpy(rl->name, srl->name, sizeof(rl->name));
00459         rl->lay= srl->lay;
00460         rl->lay_zmask= srl->lay_zmask;
00461         rl->layflag= srl->layflag;
00462         rl->passflag= srl->passflag; // for debugging: srl->passflag|SCE_PASS_RAYHITS;
00463         rl->pass_xor= srl->pass_xor;
00464         rl->light_override= srl->light_override;
00465         rl->mat_override= srl->mat_override;
00466         rl->rectx= rectx;
00467         rl->recty= recty;
00468         
00469         if (rr->exrhandle) {
00470             IMB_exr_add_channel(rr->exrhandle, rl->name, "Combined.R", 0, 0, NULL);
00471             IMB_exr_add_channel(rr->exrhandle, rl->name, "Combined.G", 0, 0, NULL);
00472             IMB_exr_add_channel(rr->exrhandle, rl->name, "Combined.B", 0, 0, NULL);
00473             IMB_exr_add_channel(rr->exrhandle, rl->name, "Combined.A", 0, 0, NULL);
00474         }
00475         else
00476             rl->rectf= MEM_mapallocN(rectx*recty*sizeof(float)*4, "Combined rgba");
00477         
00478         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_Z)
00479             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 1, SCE_PASS_Z);
00480         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_VECTOR)
00481             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 4, SCE_PASS_VECTOR);
00482         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_NORMAL)
00483             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_NORMAL);
00484         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_UV) 
00485             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_UV);
00486         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_RGBA)
00487             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 4, SCE_PASS_RGBA);
00488         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_EMIT)
00489             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_EMIT);
00490         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE)
00491             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE);
00492         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_SPEC)
00493             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_SPEC);
00494         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_AO)
00495             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_AO);
00496         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_ENVIRONMENT)
00497             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_ENVIRONMENT);
00498         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_INDIRECT)
00499             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_INDIRECT);
00500         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_SHADOW)
00501             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_SHADOW);
00502         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_REFLECT)
00503             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_REFLECT);
00504         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_REFRACT)
00505             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_REFRACT);
00506         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_INDEXOB)
00507             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 1, SCE_PASS_INDEXOB);
00508         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_INDEXMA)
00509             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 1, SCE_PASS_INDEXMA);
00510         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_MIST)
00511             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 1, SCE_PASS_MIST);
00512         if (rl->passflag & SCE_PASS_RAYHITS)
00513             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 4, SCE_PASS_RAYHITS);
00514         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT)
00515             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT);
00516         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT)
00517             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT);
00518         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR)
00519             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR);
00520         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT)
00521             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT);
00522         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT)
00523             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT);
00524         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR)
00525             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR);
00526         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_TRANSM_DIRECT)
00527             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_TRANSM_DIRECT);
00528         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_TRANSM_INDIRECT)
00529             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_TRANSM_INDIRECT);
00530         if (srl->passflag  & SCE_PASS_TRANSM_COLOR)
00531             render_layer_add_pass(rr, rl, 3, SCE_PASS_TRANSM_COLOR);
00532         
00533     }
00534     /* sss, previewrender and envmap don't do layers, so we make a default one */
00535     if (rr->layers.first==NULL) {
00536         rl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(RenderLayer), "new render layer");
00537         BLI_addtail(&rr->layers, rl);
00538         
00539         rl->rectx= rectx;
00540         rl->recty= recty;
00541 
00542         /* duplicate code... */
00543         if (rr->exrhandle) {
00544             IMB_exr_add_channel(rr->exrhandle, rl->name, "Combined.R", 0, 0, NULL);
00545             IMB_exr_add_channel(rr->exrhandle, rl->name, "Combined.G", 0, 0, NULL);
00546             IMB_exr_add_channel(rr->exrhandle, rl->name, "Combined.B", 0, 0, NULL);
00547             IMB_exr_add_channel(rr->exrhandle, rl->name, "Combined.A", 0, 0, NULL);
00548         }
00549         else
00550             rl->rectf= MEM_mapallocN(rectx*recty*sizeof(float)*4, "Combined rgba");
00551         
00552         /* note, this has to be in sync with scene.c */
00553         rl->lay= (1<<20) -1;
00554         rl->layflag= 0x7FFF;    /* solid ztra halo strand */
00555         rl->passflag= SCE_PASS_COMBINED;
00556         
00557         re->r.actlay= 0;
00558     }
00559     
00560     /* border render; calculate offset for use in compositor. compo is centralized coords */
00561     rr->xof= re->disprect.xmin + (re->disprect.xmax - re->disprect.xmin)/2 - re->winx/2;
00562     rr->yof= re->disprect.ymin + (re->disprect.ymax - re->disprect.ymin)/2 - re->winy/2;
00563     
00564     return rr;
00565 }
00566 
00567 /* allocate osa new results for samples */
00568 RenderResult *render_result_new_full_sample(Render *re, ListBase *lb, rcti *partrct, int crop, int savebuffers)
00569 {
00570     int a;
00571     
00572     if (re->osa==0)
00573         return render_result_new(re, partrct, crop, savebuffers);
00574     
00575     for (a=0; a<re->osa; a++) {
00576         RenderResult *rr= render_result_new(re, partrct, crop, savebuffers);
00577         BLI_addtail(lb, rr);
00578         rr->sample_nr= a;
00579     }
00580     
00581     return lb->first;
00582 }
00583 
00584 /* callbacks for render_result_new_from_exr */
00585 static void *ml_addlayer_cb(void *base, char *str)
00586 {
00587     RenderResult *rr= base;
00588     RenderLayer *rl;
00589     
00590     rl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(RenderLayer), "new render layer");
00591     BLI_addtail(&rr->layers, rl);
00592     
00593     BLI_strncpy(rl->name, str, EXR_LAY_MAXNAME);
00594     return rl;
00595 }
00596 
00597 static void ml_addpass_cb(void *UNUSED(base), void *lay, char *str, float *rect, int totchan, char *chan_id)
00598 {
00599     RenderLayer *rl= lay;   
00600     RenderPass *rpass= MEM_callocN(sizeof(RenderPass), "loaded pass");
00601     int a;
00602     
00603     BLI_addtail(&rl->passes, rpass);
00604     rpass->channels= totchan;
00605 
00606     rpass->passtype= passtype_from_name(str);
00607     if (rpass->passtype==0) printf("unknown pass %s\n", str);
00608     rl->passflag |= rpass->passtype;
00609     
00610     BLI_strncpy(rpass->name, str, EXR_PASS_MAXNAME);
00611     /* channel id chars */
00612     for (a=0; a<totchan; a++)
00613         rpass->chan_id[a]= chan_id[a];
00614     
00615     rpass->rect= rect;
00616 }
00617 
00618 /* from imbuf, if a handle was returned we convert this to render result */
00619 RenderResult *render_result_new_from_exr(void *exrhandle, int rectx, int recty)
00620 {
00621     RenderResult *rr= MEM_callocN(sizeof(RenderResult), "loaded render result");
00622     RenderLayer *rl;
00623     RenderPass *rpass;
00624     
00625     rr->rectx= rectx;
00626     rr->recty= recty;
00627     
00628     IMB_exr_multilayer_convert(exrhandle, rr, ml_addlayer_cb, ml_addpass_cb);
00629 
00630     for (rl=rr->layers.first; rl; rl=rl->next) {
00631         rl->rectx= rectx;
00632         rl->recty= recty;
00633 
00634         for (rpass=rl->passes.first; rpass; rpass=rpass->next) {
00635             rpass->rectx= rectx;
00636             rpass->recty= recty;
00637         }
00638     }
00639     
00640     return rr;
00641 }
00642 
00643 /*********************************** Merge ***********************************/
00644 
00645 static void do_merge_tile(RenderResult *rr, RenderResult *rrpart, float *target, float *tile, int pixsize)
00646 {
00647     int y, ofs, copylen, tilex, tiley;
00648     
00649     copylen= tilex= rrpart->rectx;
00650     tiley= rrpart->recty;
00651     
00652     if (rrpart->crop) { /* filters add pixel extra */
00653         tile+= pixsize*(rrpart->crop + rrpart->crop*tilex);
00654         
00655         copylen= tilex - 2*rrpart->crop;
00656         tiley -= 2*rrpart->crop;
00657         
00658         ofs= (rrpart->tilerect.ymin + rrpart->crop)*rr->rectx + (rrpart->tilerect.xmin+rrpart->crop);
00659         target+= pixsize*ofs;
00660     }
00661     else {
00662         ofs= (rrpart->tilerect.ymin*rr->rectx + rrpart->tilerect.xmin);
00663         target+= pixsize*ofs;
00664     }
00665 
00666     copylen *= sizeof(float)*pixsize;
00667     tilex *= pixsize;
00668     ofs= pixsize*rr->rectx;
00669 
00670     for (y=0; y<tiley; y++) {
00671         memcpy(target, tile, copylen);
00672         target+= ofs;
00673         tile+= tilex;
00674     }
00675 }
00676 
00677 /* used when rendering to a full buffer, or when reading the exr part-layer-pass file */
00678 /* no test happens here if it fits... we also assume layers are in sync */
00679 /* is used within threads */
00680 void render_result_merge(RenderResult *rr, RenderResult *rrpart)
00681 {
00682     RenderLayer *rl, *rlp;
00683     RenderPass *rpass, *rpassp;
00684     
00685     for (rl= rr->layers.first, rlp= rrpart->layers.first; rl && rlp; rl= rl->next, rlp= rlp->next) {
00686         
00687         /* combined */
00688         if (rl->rectf && rlp->rectf)
00689             do_merge_tile(rr, rrpart, rl->rectf, rlp->rectf, 4);
00690         
00691         /* passes are allocated in sync */
00692         for (rpass= rl->passes.first, rpassp= rlp->passes.first; rpass && rpassp; rpass= rpass->next, rpassp= rpassp->next) {
00693             do_merge_tile(rr, rrpart, rpass->rect, rpassp->rect, rpass->channels);
00694         }
00695     }
00696 }
00697 
00698 /* for passes read from files, these have names stored */
00699 static char *make_pass_name(RenderPass *rpass, int chan)
00700 {
00701     static char name[16];
00702     int len;
00703     
00704     BLI_strncpy(name, rpass->name, EXR_PASS_MAXNAME);
00705     len= strlen(name);
00706     name[len]= '.';
00707     name[len+1]= rpass->chan_id[chan];
00708     name[len+2]= 0;
00709 
00710     return name;
00711 }
00712 
00713 /* filename already made absolute */
00714 /* called from within UI, saves both rendered result as a file-read result */
00715 int RE_WriteRenderResult(ReportList *reports, RenderResult *rr, const char *filename, int compress)
00716 {
00717     RenderLayer *rl;
00718     RenderPass *rpass;
00719     void *exrhandle= IMB_exr_get_handle();
00720     int success;
00721 
00722     BLI_make_existing_file(filename);
00723     
00724     /* composite result */
00725     if (rr->rectf) {
00726         IMB_exr_add_channel(exrhandle, "Composite", "Combined.R", 4, 4*rr->rectx, rr->rectf);
00727         IMB_exr_add_channel(exrhandle, "Composite", "Combined.G", 4, 4*rr->rectx, rr->rectf+1);
00728         IMB_exr_add_channel(exrhandle, "Composite", "Combined.B", 4, 4*rr->rectx, rr->rectf+2);
00729         IMB_exr_add_channel(exrhandle, "Composite", "Combined.A", 4, 4*rr->rectx, rr->rectf+3);
00730     }
00731     
00732     /* add layers/passes and assign channels */
00733     for (rl= rr->layers.first; rl; rl= rl->next) {
00734         
00735         /* combined */
00736         if (rl->rectf) {
00737             int a, xstride= 4;
00738             for (a=0; a<xstride; a++)
00739                 IMB_exr_add_channel(exrhandle, rl->name, get_pass_name(SCE_PASS_COMBINED, a), 
00740                                     xstride, xstride*rr->rectx, rl->rectf+a);
00741         }
00742         
00743         /* passes are allocated in sync */
00744         for (rpass= rl->passes.first; rpass; rpass= rpass->next) {
00745             int a, xstride= rpass->channels;
00746             for (a=0; a<xstride; a++) {
00747                 if (rpass->passtype)
00748                     IMB_exr_add_channel(exrhandle, rl->name, get_pass_name(rpass->passtype, a), 
00749                                         xstride, xstride*rr->rectx, rpass->rect+a);
00750                 else
00751                     IMB_exr_add_channel(exrhandle, rl->name, make_pass_name(rpass, a), 
00752                                         xstride, xstride*rr->rectx, rpass->rect+a);
00753             }
00754         }
00755     }
00756 
00757     /* when the filename has no permissions, this can fail */
00758     if (IMB_exr_begin_write(exrhandle, filename, rr->rectx, rr->recty, compress)) {
00759         IMB_exr_write_channels(exrhandle);
00760         success= TRUE;
00761     }
00762     else {
00763         /* TODO, get the error from openexr's exception */
00764         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error Writing Render Result, see console");
00765         success= FALSE;
00766     }
00767     IMB_exr_close(exrhandle);
00768 
00769     return success;
00770 }
00771 
00772 /**************************** Single Layer Rendering *************************/
00773 
00774 void render_result_single_layer_begin(Render *re)
00775 {
00776     /* all layers except the active one get temporally pushed away */
00777 
00778     /* officially pushed result should be NULL... error can happen with do_seq */
00779     RE_FreeRenderResult(re->pushedresult);
00780     
00781     re->pushedresult= re->result;
00782     re->result= NULL;
00783 }
00784 
00785 /* if scemode is R_SINGLE_LAYER, at end of rendering, merge the both render results */
00786 void render_result_single_layer_end(Render *re)
00787 {
00788     SceneRenderLayer *srl;
00789     RenderLayer *rlpush;
00790     RenderLayer *rl;
00791     int nr;
00792 
00793     if (re->result==NULL) {
00794         printf("pop render result error; no current result!\n");
00795         return;
00796     }
00797 
00798     if (!re->pushedresult)
00799         return;
00800 
00801     if (re->pushedresult->rectx==re->result->rectx && re->pushedresult->recty==re->result->recty) {
00802         /* find which layer in re->pushedresult should be replaced */
00803         rl= re->result->layers.first;
00804         
00805         /* render result should be empty after this */
00806         BLI_remlink(&re->result->layers, rl);
00807         
00808         /* reconstruct render result layers */
00809         for (nr=0, srl= re->scene->r.layers.first; srl; srl= srl->next, nr++) {
00810             if (nr==re->r.actlay)
00811                 BLI_addtail(&re->result->layers, rl);
00812             else {
00813                 rlpush= RE_GetRenderLayer(re->pushedresult, srl->name);
00814                 if (rlpush) {
00815                     BLI_remlink(&re->pushedresult->layers, rlpush);
00816                     BLI_addtail(&re->result->layers, rlpush);
00817                 }
00818             }
00819         }
00820     }
00821 
00822     RE_FreeRenderResult(re->pushedresult);
00823     re->pushedresult= NULL;
00824 }
00825 
00826 /************************* EXR Tile File Rendering ***************************/
00827 
00828 static void save_render_result_tile(RenderResult *rr, RenderResult *rrpart)
00829 {
00830     RenderLayer *rlp;
00831     RenderPass *rpassp;
00832     int offs, partx, party;
00833     
00834     BLI_lock_thread(LOCK_IMAGE);
00835     
00836     for (rlp= rrpart->layers.first; rlp; rlp= rlp->next) {
00837         
00838         if (rrpart->crop) { /* filters add pixel extra */
00839             offs= (rrpart->crop + rrpart->crop*rrpart->rectx);
00840         }
00841         else {
00842             offs= 0;
00843         }
00844         
00845         /* combined */
00846         if (rlp->rectf) {
00847             int a, xstride= 4;
00848             for (a=0; a<xstride; a++)
00849                 IMB_exr_set_channel(rr->exrhandle, rlp->name, get_pass_name(SCE_PASS_COMBINED, a), 
00850                                 xstride, xstride*rrpart->rectx, rlp->rectf+a + xstride*offs);
00851         }
00852         
00853         /* passes are allocated in sync */
00854         for (rpassp= rlp->passes.first; rpassp; rpassp= rpassp->next) {
00855             int a, xstride= rpassp->channels;
00856             for (a=0; a<xstride; a++)
00857                 IMB_exr_set_channel(rr->exrhandle, rlp->name, get_pass_name(rpassp->passtype, a), 
00858                                     xstride, xstride*rrpart->rectx, rpassp->rect+a + xstride*offs);
00859         }
00860         
00861     }
00862 
00863     party= rrpart->tilerect.ymin + rrpart->crop;
00864     partx= rrpart->tilerect.xmin + rrpart->crop;
00865     IMB_exrtile_write_channels(rr->exrhandle, partx, party, 0);
00866 
00867     BLI_unlock_thread(LOCK_IMAGE);
00868 }
00869 
00870 static void save_empty_result_tiles(Render *re)
00871 {
00872     RenderPart *pa;
00873     RenderResult *rr;
00874     
00875     for (rr= re->result; rr; rr= rr->next) {
00876         IMB_exrtile_clear_channels(rr->exrhandle);
00877         
00878         for (pa= re->parts.first; pa; pa= pa->next) {
00879             if (pa->ready==0) {
00880                 int party= pa->disprect.ymin - re->disprect.ymin + pa->crop;
00881                 int partx= pa->disprect.xmin - re->disprect.xmin + pa->crop;
00882                 IMB_exrtile_write_channels(rr->exrhandle, partx, party, 0);
00883             }
00884         }
00885     }
00886 }
00887 
00888 /* begin write of exr tile file */
00889 void render_result_exr_file_begin(Render *re)
00890 {
00891     RenderResult *rr;
00892     char str[FILE_MAX];
00893     
00894     for (rr= re->result; rr; rr= rr->next) {
00895         render_result_exr_file_path(re->scene, rr->sample_nr, str);
00896     
00897         printf("write exr tmp file, %dx%d, %s\n", rr->rectx, rr->recty, str);
00898         IMB_exrtile_begin_write(rr->exrhandle, str, 0, rr->rectx, rr->recty, re->partx, re->party);
00899     }
00900 }
00901 
00902 /* end write of exr tile file, read back first sample */
00903 void render_result_exr_file_end(Render *re)
00904 {
00905     RenderResult *rr;
00906 
00907     save_empty_result_tiles(re);
00908     
00909     for (rr= re->result; rr; rr= rr->next) {
00910         IMB_exr_close(rr->exrhandle);
00911         rr->exrhandle= NULL;
00912     }
00913     
00914     render_result_free_list(&re->fullresult, re->result);
00915     re->result= NULL;
00916 
00917     render_result_exr_file_read(re, 0);
00918 }
00919 
00920 /* save part into exr file */
00921 void render_result_exr_file_merge(RenderResult *rr, RenderResult *rrpart)
00922 {
00923     for (; rr && rrpart; rr= rr->next, rrpart= rrpart->next)
00924         save_render_result_tile(rr, rrpart);
00925 }
00926 
00927 /* path to temporary exr file */
00928 void render_result_exr_file_path(Scene *scene, int sample, char *filepath)
00929 {
00930     char di[FILE_MAX], name[FILE_MAXFILE+MAX_ID_NAME+100], fi[FILE_MAXFILE];
00931     
00932     BLI_strncpy(di, G.main->name, FILE_MAX);
00933     BLI_splitdirstring(di, fi);
00934     
00935     if (sample==0)
00936         BLI_snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s_%s.exr", fi, scene->id.name+2);
00937     else
00938         BLI_snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s_%s%d.exr", fi, scene->id.name+2, sample);
00939 
00940     BLI_make_file_string("/", filepath, BLI_temporary_dir(), name);
00941 }
00942 
00943 /* only for temp buffer files, makes exact copy of render result */
00944 int render_result_exr_file_read(Render *re, int sample)
00945 {
00946     char str[FILE_MAX];
00947     int success;
00948 
00949     RE_FreeRenderResult(re->result);
00950     re->result= render_result_new(re, &re->disprect, 0, RR_USE_MEM);
00951 
00952     render_result_exr_file_path(re->scene, sample, str);
00953     printf("read exr tmp file: %s\n", str);
00954 
00955     if (render_result_exr_file_read_path(re->result, str)) {
00956         success= TRUE;
00957     }
00958     else {
00959         printf("cannot read: %s\n", str);
00960         success= FALSE;
00961 
00962     }
00963 
00964     return success;
00965 }
00966 
00967 /* called for reading temp files, and for external engines */
00968 int render_result_exr_file_read_path(RenderResult *rr, const char *filepath)
00969 {
00970     RenderLayer *rl;
00971     RenderPass *rpass;
00972     void *exrhandle= IMB_exr_get_handle();
00973     int rectx, recty;
00974 
00975     if (IMB_exr_begin_read(exrhandle, filepath, &rectx, &recty)==0) {
00976         printf("failed being read %s\n", filepath);
00977         IMB_exr_close(exrhandle);
00978         return 0;
00979     }
00980 
00981     if (rr == NULL || rectx!=rr->rectx || recty!=rr->recty) {
00982         if (rr)
00983             printf("error in reading render result: dimensions don't match\n");
00984         else
00985             printf("error in reading render result: NULL result pointer\n");
00986         IMB_exr_close(exrhandle);
00987         return 0;
00988     }
00989 
00990     for (rl= rr->layers.first; rl; rl= rl->next) {
00991         /* combined */
00992         if (rl->rectf) {
00993             int a, xstride= 4;
00994             for (a=0; a<xstride; a++)
00995                 IMB_exr_set_channel(exrhandle, rl->name, get_pass_name(SCE_PASS_COMBINED, a), 
00996                                     xstride, xstride*rectx, rl->rectf+a);
00997         }
00998         
00999         /* passes are allocated in sync */
01000         for (rpass= rl->passes.first; rpass; rpass= rpass->next) {
01001             int a, xstride= rpass->channels;
01002             for (a=0; a<xstride; a++)
01003                 IMB_exr_set_channel(exrhandle, rl->name, get_pass_name(rpass->passtype, a), 
01004                                     xstride, xstride*rectx, rpass->rect+a);
01005 
01006             BLI_strncpy(rpass->name, get_pass_name(rpass->passtype, -1), sizeof(rpass->name));
01007         }
01008     }
01009 
01010     IMB_exr_read_channels(exrhandle);
01011     IMB_exr_close(exrhandle);
01012 
01013     return 1;
01014 }
01015 
01016 /*************************** Combined Pixel Rect *****************************/
01017 
01018 ImBuf *render_result_rect_to_ibuf(RenderResult *rr, RenderData *rd)
01019 {
01020     int flags = (rd->color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT_PREDIVIDE)? IB_cm_predivide: 0;
01021     ImBuf *ibuf= IMB_allocImBuf(rr->rectx, rr->recty, rd->im_format.planes, flags);
01022     
01023     /* if not exists, BKE_write_ibuf makes one */
01024     ibuf->rect= (unsigned int *)rr->rect32;    
01025     ibuf->rect_float= rr->rectf;
01026     ibuf->zbuf_float= rr->rectz;
01027     
01028     /* float factor for random dither, imbuf takes care of it */
01029     ibuf->dither= rd->dither_intensity;
01030     
01031     /* prepare to gamma correct to sRGB color space */
01032     if (rd->color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT) {
01033         /* sequence editor can generate 8bpc render buffers */
01034         if (ibuf->rect) {
01035             ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
01036             if (BKE_imtype_valid_depths(rd->im_format.imtype) & (R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_12|R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_16|R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_24|R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_32))
01037                 IMB_float_from_rect(ibuf);
01038         }
01039         else {
01040             ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
01041         }
01042     }
01043 
01044     /* color -> greyscale */
01045     /* editing directly would alter the render view */
01046     if (rd->im_format.planes == R_IMF_PLANES_BW) {
01047         ImBuf *ibuf_bw= IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf);
01048         IMB_color_to_bw(ibuf_bw);
01049         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
01050         ibuf= ibuf_bw;
01051     }
01052 
01053     return ibuf;
01054 }
01055 
01056 void render_result_rect_from_ibuf(RenderResult *rr, RenderData *rd, ImBuf *ibuf)
01057 {
01058     if (ibuf->rect_float) {
01059         /* color management: when off ensure rectf is non-lin, since thats what the internal
01060          * render engine delivers */
01061         int profile_to= (rd->color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT)? IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB: IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
01062         int profile_from= (ibuf->profile == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB)? IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB: IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
01063         int predivide= (rd->color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT_PREDIVIDE);
01064 
01065         if (!rr->rectf)
01066             rr->rectf= MEM_mallocN(4*sizeof(float)*rr->rectx*rr->recty, "render_seq rectf");
01067         
01068         IMB_buffer_float_from_float(rr->rectf, ibuf->rect_float,
01069             4, profile_to, profile_from, predivide,
01070             rr->rectx, rr->recty, rr->rectx, rr->rectx);
01071         
01072         /* TSK! Since sequence render doesn't free the *rr render result, the old rect32
01073          * can hang around when sequence render has rendered a 32 bits one before */
01074         if (rr->rect32) {
01075             MEM_freeN(rr->rect32);
01076             rr->rect32= NULL;
01077         }
01078     }
01079     else if (ibuf->rect) {
01080         if (!rr->rect32)
01081             rr->rect32= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int)*rr->rectx*rr->recty, "render_seq rect");
01082 
01083         memcpy(rr->rect32, ibuf->rect, 4*rr->rectx*rr->recty);
01084 
01085         /* Same things as above, old rectf can hang around from previous render. */
01086         if (rr->rectf) {
01087             MEM_freeN(rr->rectf);
01088             rr->rectf= NULL;
01089         }
01090     }
01091 }
01092 
01093 void render_result_rect_fill_zero(RenderResult *rr)
01094 {
01095     if (rr->rectf)
01096         memset(rr->rectf, 0, 4*sizeof(float)*rr->rectx*rr->recty);
01097     else if (rr->rect32)
01098         memset(rr->rect32, 0, 4*rr->rectx*rr->recty);
01099     else
01100         rr->rect32= MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*rr->rectx*rr->recty, "render_seq rect");
01101 }
01102 
01103 void render_result_rect_get_pixels(RenderResult *rr, RenderData *rd, unsigned int *rect, int rectx, int recty)
01104 {
01105     if (rr->rect32) {
01106         memcpy(rect, rr->rect32, sizeof(int)*rr->rectx*rr->recty);
01107     }
01108     else if (rr->rectf) {
01109         int profile_from= (rd->color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT)? IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB: IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
01110         int predivide= (rd->color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT_PREDIVIDE);
01111         int dither= 0;
01112 
01113         IMB_buffer_byte_from_float((unsigned char*)rect, rr->rectf,
01114             4, dither, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, profile_from, predivide,
01115             rr->rectx, rr->recty, rr->rectx, rr->rectx);
01116     }
01117     else
01118         /* else fill with black */
01119         memset(rect, 0, sizeof(int)*rectx*recty);
01120 }
